title: Mailvox: I’m not an effigy
author: VD
content_html:
Sinewave expresses bafflement:


How does a mohawked maverick get a job writing at WorldNetDaily anyhow? Did Vox have a career in journalism before WND?

He calls up Mr. Joseph Farah and volunteers to write something different than the usual fare. I don’t think “career” is the most apt word to describe it, but my writing had appeared in the St. Paul Pioneer Press, the Boston Globe, the Atlanta Journal/Constitution and the North Bay Nugget prior to showing up in WND. Since then, it has appeared in a number of other places, including Pravda.

You probably think I’m kidding. Stone cold veracity, curveball.
content_text:
Sinewave expresses bafflement:
How does a mohawked maverick get a job writing at WorldNetDaily anyhow? Did Vox have a career in journalism before WND?
He calls up Mr. Joseph Farah and volunteers to write something different than the usual fare.  I don’t think “career” is the most apt word to describe it, but my writing had appeared in the St. Paul Pioneer Press, the Boston Globe, the Atlanta Journal/Constitution and the North Bay Nugget prior to showing up in WND.  Since then, it has appeared in a number of other places, including Pravda.
You probably think I’m kidding.  Stone cold veracity, curveball.
